mapper.select: SELECT b.book_id, b.user_id, b.dept_id, b.title, b.publisher, b.year, b.isbn, b.word_file_name, b.status, b.reject_reason, u.user_name, u.email as user_email, d.dept_name FROM book b LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON b.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN dept d ON b.dept_id = d.dept_id ORDER BY b.book_id DESC

SELECT b.book_id, b.user_id, b.dept_id, b.title, b.publisher, b.year, b.isbn, b.word_file_name, b.status, b.reject_reason, u.user_name, u.email as user_email, d.dept_name FROM book b LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON b.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN dept d ON b.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE b.book_id = #{id}

SELECT b.book_id, b.user_id, b.dept_id, b.title, b.publisher, b.year, b.isbn, b.word_file_name, b.status, b.reject_reason, u.user_name, u.email as user_email, d.dept_name FROM book b LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON b.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN dept d ON b.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE b.status = #{status} ORDER BY b.book_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book ( user_id, dept_id, title, publisher, year, isbn, word_file_name, status ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{deptId}, #{title}, #{publisher}, #{year}, #{isbn}, #{wordFileName}, #{status} )
mapper.update: UPDATE book SET user_id = #{userId}, dept_id = #{deptId}, title = #{title}, publisher = #{publisher}, year = #{year}, isbn = #{isbn}, word_file_name = #{wordFileName}, status = #{status}, reject_reason = #{rejectReason} WHERE book_id = #{bookId}
